label: none
description: No regional lymph nodes removed. No lymph nodes found in the pathologic specimen. Diagnosed at autopsy.

label: biopsy or aspiration, NOS
description: Biopsy or aspiration of regional lymph node, NOS.

label: regional lymph nodes removed, NOS
description: Regional lymph node(s) removed and the number of nodes removed is unknown or not stated; the procedure is not specified as sentinel node biopsy. Regional lymph nodes removed, NOS.

label: 4+ regional lymph nodes removed
description: 4 or more regional lymph nodes removed.

label: sentinel node biopsy and regional lymph nodes removed, same time
description: Sentinel node biopsy and code 3, 4, or 5 at same time or timing not stated.

label: sentinel node biopsy and regional lymph nodes removed, different times
description: Sentinel node biopsy and code 3, 4, or 5 at different times.
